summary.i18n_library_note: react-i18next and i18next are installed and configured (lib/i18n.ts exists), but not used in these pages

recommendations.description: Add 'import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next';' to all 8 pages and destructure the t function: 'const { t } = useTranslation();'

Define comprehensive translation keys in locales files (en/pages.json, es/pages.json, etc.) organized by page: feed.*, profile.*, messages.*, notifications.*, friendship.*, followers.*, following.*, savedPosts.*

recommendations.action: Replace hardcoded strings with t() calls
recommendations.description: Systematically replace all 324+ hardcoded English strings with t('namespace.key') calls across all pages
Use i18next pluralization features for strings like 'notification/notifications', 'conversation/conversations', etc.
Use interpolation for dynamic values like usernames, dates, counts: t('key', { username, count })
Verify LanguageSelector component works correctly on all pages and triggers re-renders with translated content
